short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to display the current time and a trading quote on every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Display random trading quotes on new tabs.
Trading Quotes is a lightweight and inspiring Chrome extension that displays random trading related quotes on your new tab page. Each time you open a new tab, you'll be greeted with a thought-provoking quote. On top of this you can add your biggest goal to the bottom of the screen to stay motivated and push forward!

Did a quote move you? Great! Share it to Twitter with the button in the bottom left of the screen!
